projects.title: E Commerce Website and App
projects.description: We are working o building a multi-vendor hyper-local E-commerce Website and app whose motto is to give the advantages of local vendors to the customer and to provide lightning fast delivery.This is my freelancing project.

projects.title: Pothole Detection System
projects.description: We made a crowdsourcing app that can use the data from the accelerometer from smartphones and detect anomalies (using deep learning) in the road sends the location of the pothole to the server so that we can help the public organization to early detect potholes and fix it as soon as possible. we tried to help the government to early detect potholes and reduce the number of accidents that occur due to road anomalies and we can easily show those points where people are getting most effected and least effected by potholes easily and thus help the government to use the road maintenance budget efficiently.

projects.title: Farmigo
projects.description: PROBLEM:The problem we tried to solve was about farmers facing different problems in their day-to-day lives. To solve this problem, we designed a web service which will aid in direct farmer-to-farmer and farmer-to-supplier communication so as to make a fruitful community and better service support which will lead to greater profitability for all farmers. Some of the common problems we aim to resolve are the availability of good quality seeds, pesticides and fertilizers, small landholdings, and lack of mechanization.SOLUTION:We propose a web service with a website which will provide the following features:1. A login option for farmers, retailers, and wholesalers, suppliers and service providers for inter-communication between different communities.2. Advertisements for offers can be published on the website and can be notified to farmers through SMS.3. Chat service for inter-community communication.4. A reviewing and complaining system for farmers for better selection and quality check of products.5. We provided them with live data for the government declared selling price of the crop in their region.6. We also provided then with live weather data and weather forecast to help them in decision making.CONCLUSION:Our web service will give the farmers a platform to share their grievances and get helpful feedback form others who are facing or have faced a similar problem. This can help them to increase their efficiency and get a better value of their products.

projects.title: Text Summarizer
projects.description: We made a text summarizer which has the ability to summarize text abstractivly using Recurrent Neural Networks.

projects.title: Simple IoT project
projects.description: We made a simple IoT device that can exchange analog and digital signals with each other using Node red and AWS IoT and further we also made a tweet mechanism using Node Red.
